title: Unpacking the Bogdanovic Debacle and First Day of Free Agency Recap | The Mismatch
description:
Verno and KOC discuss the Bogdan Bogdanovic debacle and its affect on the first few hours of free agency (0:00), the situation in Philly, what the Hawks could look like next season, and Detroit’s free agency moves (1:00). Then, they go through all of the deals made in the first few hours of free agency (30:00).
Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
